channel.title: Warnings
channel.description:
This is being posted due to heavy confusion in the warning department. Most of you seem to think that you can't go from a level without a warning, straight to a moderation or mute, but rather they must be warned first. [b]This is not true.[/b] We do not know how this thought came about, but the rants saying "I should've been warned, not muted, wtf?" need to stop. Punishments are at the moderator's discretion, [b]not yours.[/b]
Basically, we can give you whatever punishment we want if we feel its needed.

item.title: Warnings
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

This is being posted due to heavy confusion in the warning department. Most of you seem to think that you can’t go from a level without a warning, straight to a moderation or mute, but rather they must be warned first. This is not true. We do not know how this thought came about, but the rants saying “I should’ve been warned, not muted, wtf?” need to stop. Punishments are at the moderator’s discretion, not yours.

Basically, we can give you whatever punishment we want if we feel its needed.

Read full topic
